Module dbConnect

Package dbConnect

package dbConnect
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    dbConnect.execution
     
    dbConnect.models
     
  • Class
    Description
    ConnectorString
     
    DBConnect
    Database Connector class.
    This class contains: DBConnect.initialize() initialize DBConnect using default value. DBConnect.initialize(String) initialize DBConnect for a local database server. DBConnect.initialize(String, int, String, String) overload local connection with custom details. DBConnect.initialize(String, String, int, String, String) initialize DBConnect with fully customizable details. DBConnect.initCheck() check if DBConnect is initialized yet. DBConnect.retrieve(Class, String, Object...) get certain data from a table. DBConnect.retrieveAll(Class) get all data from a certain table. DBConnect.insert(Object) insert data to a certain table. DBConnect.update(Object) update data to a certain row in a table. DBConnect.delete(Object) delete data from a certain row in a table.
    DBMapper<T>
    An interface that handles mapping of ResultSet.
    DBQuery
    Database query class.
    Constructor: DBQuery(String, String, String) initialize DBQuery This class contains: DBQuery.loadData(String, DBMapper, Object...) fetching data from database server. DBQuery.setData(String, Object...) insert or modify data from database server.
